description: [{'description': "The 2023 Honda CR-V EX-L AWD is a sophisticated and versatile compact SUV that combines practicality with a touch of luxury. This model is powered by a robust 1.5-liter turbocharged 4-cylinder engine, delivering 190 horsepower and 179 lb-ft of torque, ensuring a responsive and efficient driving experience. The all-wheel-drive system provides excellent traction and stability, making it well-suited for a variety of driving conditions, from city streets to rugged terrain. On the exterior, the CR-V EX-L AWD boasts a sleek, aerodynamic design with a modern front grille, stylish LED headlights, and bold lines that convey a sense of confidence and agility. Inside, the EX-L trim level offers a premium cabin experience. It features leather-trimmed seats, a leather-wrapped steering wheel, and a power-adjustable driver's seat with memory function, providing both comfort and convenience. The spacious interior is designed to accommodate five passengers comfortably, with ample legroom and cargo space. The rear seats can be easily folded down to expand the cargo area, making it practical for carrying larger items. Technology in the 2023 CR-V EX-L AWD is advanced and user-friendly. The 7-inch Display Audio touchscreen infotainment system includes Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration, ensuring seamless connectivity for your smartphone. Additional tech features include a power tailgate, dual-zone automatic climate control, and a comprehensive suite of Honda Sensing safety and driver-assistive technologies, such as adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, and collision mitigation braking. Overall, the 2023 Honda CR-V EX-L AWD stands out as a well-rounded SUV that blends performance, comfort, and cutting-edge technology, making it an excellent choice for families and individuals seeking a reliable and stylish vehicle. Priced @ only $41,296! $700 finance credit when financed here through the bank of your choice! 120 POINT MECHANICAL INSPECTION! FRESH OIL SERVICE! 4 WHEEL ALIGNMENT! NEW NS SAFETY STICKER! PROFESSIONALLY DETAILED! CALL OR TEXT ********** NOW FOR YOUR QUICK AND EASY PRE APPROVAL OR TO BOOK YOUR TEST DRIVE! TRURO MAZDA PROMISE At Truro Mazda we treat our customers like family. That is why every single one of our pre-owned vehicles goes through our extensive 120 point mechanical inspection. In addition, we provide EASY FINANCING with guaranteed approvals for every financial situation whether it be perfect credit, bankruptcy, slow payment, collections, etc. We have the GUARANTEED BEST VALUE on all of our vehicles and will DELIVER ANY VEHICLE FREE OF CHARGE ALL OVER ATLANTIC CANADA! Make your next car buying experience an awesome one by calling Truro Mazda NOW at ********** or TEXT ********** available 24 hours a day, seven days a week! We look forward to meeting you! In just 3 short years Truro Mazda has become a major destination for Pre Owned vehicles shoppers in the Central and Northern Nova Scotia area. Come in today to see why our customers love us. "}]

description:
[{'description': "
The 2020 Honda CR-V LX is a popular trim of the Honda CR-V, a compact SUV known for its reliability, spacious interior, and solid performance. Here's a detailed overview of the 2020 CR-V LX:
Performance	
Engine: 2.4-liter 4-cylinder engine.
	
Power: Approximately 190 horsepower.
	
Transmission: Continuously Variable Transmission (CVT).
	
Fuel Economy: Around 26 mpg city / 32 mpg highway.
Interior	
Seating: Five-passenger capacity.
	
Upholstery: Cloth seats.
	
Cargo Space: Approximately 39.2 cubic feet behind the rear seats and up to 75.8 cubic feet with the rear seats folded.
Technology	
Infotainment:			
7-inch touchscreen display.
		
Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration.
		
	
Audio: Four-speaker sound system.
	
Bluetooth: Standard.
	
USB Ports: Multiple, including USB-A.
Safety	
Honda Sensing Suite: Standard on the LX trim, includes:			
Collision Mitigation Braking System (CMBS).
		
Road Departure Mitigation System (RDM).
		
Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC).
		
Lane Keeping Assist System (LKAS).
		
	
Other Safety Features:			
Rearview camera with guidelines.
		
Stability control and traction control.
		
Multiple airbags.
		
Comfort and Convenience	
Climate Control: Manual air conditioning.
	
Power Windows and Locks: Standard.
	
Keyless Entry: Standard.
	
Driver's Seat: Manual adjustments.
	
Steering Wheel: Tilt and telescoping with controls for audio and cruise.
Additional Features	
Wheels: 17-inch alloy wheels.
	
Exterior: LED daytime running lights.
	
Interior: Height-adjustable driver's seat.

The 2020 Honda CR-V LX provides a well-rounded package with an emphasis on safety and practicality. While it may lack some of the premium features found in higher trims, it offers a comfortable and spacious interior, modern technology, and strong safety features. It's a solid choice for those seeking a reliable and versatile compact SUV.
As a Steele Auto Certified vehicle, you have peace of mind that the vehicle has undergone a rigorous 85 point inspection and has been brought up to the highest of standards. Don't forget, at Steele Volkswagen we have financing options available for all credit situations! "}]

Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2023 Honda CR-V include:
 
Heated Front Seats

Bluetooth
Leather Trimmed Seats
Hill Start Assist
Apple CarPlay & Android Auto
Rearview Camera
Brake Assist
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 34314 

Warranty:
This vehicle has only 13 months or 26,000km of warranty left.'}]

description: [{'description': "Radiating premium good looks inside and out, our 2019 Honda CR-V Touring AWD is a dream come true in Platinum White Pearl! Powered by a TurboCharged 1.5 Litre 4 Cylinder generating 190hp while connected to a seamless CVT for amazing passing commands. This trendsetting All Wheel Drive SUV serves up approximately 6.9L/100km along with composed handling and a comfortable ride. Our CR-V Touring is garnering second looks with its sculpted, distinctive stance with full LED headlights, hands-free power tailgate, sunroof, and great-looking alloy wheels on this machine. You'll love spending time in the premium interior of our Touring with its Smart Entry/Walk Away feature, remote engine start, luxurious leather heated power-adjustable front seats, auto-dimming rearview mirror, rain-sensing windshield wipers, and easy fold-down 60/40 split rear seats. Staying safely connected is a breeze with our display audio touchscreen, Bluetooth, HondaLink, Apple CarPlay/Android Auto compatibility, available satellite-linked full-color navigation with voice recognition, available satellite radio and more. Honda's reputation for safety, and durability is further enhanced with our CR-V that's outfitted with a multi-angle rearview camera, ACE body structure, advanced airbags, vehicle stability assist, and ABS. Honda Sensing, featuring lane-keeping assist, adaptive cruise control, and collision/road departure mitigation is also included. Save this Page and Call for Availability. We Know You Will Enjoy Your Test Drive Towards Ownership! Steele Chevrolet Atlantic Canada's Premier Pre-Owned Super Center. Being a GM Certified Pre-Owned vehicle ensures this unit has been fully inspected fully detailed serviced up to date and brought up to Certified standards. Market value priced for immediate delivery and ready to roll so if this is your next new to your vehicle do not hesitate. You've dealt with all the rest now get ready to deal with the BEST!     This  2023 Honda CR-V is for sale today. 
 
A legend returns! For 2023, Honda completely revised the ubiquitous CR-V, with a host of performance, design and technological upgrades to give it an even bigger edge against rivals in the ever-heated crossover SUV segment. With roomy seating, wide-open sightlines, and sporty details throughout, the all-new interior of the 2023 CR-V makes it easy to settle in and enjoy the ride. Upgraded infotainment systems with even more active and passive safety systems ensure a serene and uncompromised ride in this SUV.This low mileage  SUV has just 11,300 kms. It's  nice in colour  . It has an automatic transmission and is powered by a  1.5L I4 16V GDI DOHC Turbo engine. 
 
 Our CR-V's trim level is Sport. This CR-V Sport steps things up with an express open/close sunroof, a power liftgate for rear cargo access, and a heated leather steering wheel, along with upgraded 18-inch aluminum wheels. With an all-wheel-drive system, this incredibly versatile and practical SUV features heated front seats, 60-40 folding split-bench rear seats, proximity keyless entry with push button start, adaptive cruise control, dual-zone climate control, remote engine start, and a refreshed 7-inch infotainment system with Apple CarPlay, Android Auto and Siri Eyes Free. Safety features include blind spot detection, front and rear collision mitigation, front pedestrian braking, lane keeping assist with lane departure warning, driver monitoring alert, and a rear camera. Additional features include front and rear cupholders, LED headlights with automatic high beams, USB-A/USB-C charging ports, and even more.
 
To apply right now for financing use this link : **********

description:
[{'description': 'NO ACCIDENTS / CLEAN CARFAX / 1 OWNER / Bluetooth, Auto High Beam , Brake Assist and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2023 Honda CR-V include:
 
Bluetooth
Auto High Beam
Brake Assist
Road Departure Mitigation System
Collision Mitigation Braking System
Dual-Zone A/C
Rearview Camera
USB Port
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 33917 

Warranty:
This vehicle has only 13 months or 37,000km of warranty left.'}]

description:
[{'description': "
 
CRV LX AWD with Apple CarPlay, Heated Seats and Wheel, Dual Zone Climate and Remote Start!
 
The 2019 Honda CR-V LX delivers a dependable and efficient driving experience with its 1.5L 4-cylinder engine paired with an automatic transmission. This combination ensures a smooth ride with ample power for daily driving while maintaining impressive fuel efficiency. The vehicle's well-tuned suspension and responsive steering provide a balanced and confident driving feel, ideal for both urban and highway driving.
 
Inside, the CR-V LX offers a spacious and comfortable cabin designed to enhance your driving experience. The interior features high-quality materials, supportive seating, and a user-friendly infotainment system with a touchscreen display. The rear seats provide generous legroom, and the rear cargo area is versatile, accommodating your gear with ease thanks to its expandable space.
 
Overall, the 2019 Honda CR-V LX in silver is a practical and stylish choice, combining reliability with comfort. Its well-rounded performance, spacious interior, and thoughtful features make it a solid option for those seeking a versatile SUV for various driving needs.

All ReCar Certified Vehicles come with our 360 degree inspection which is a very meticulous and comprehensive 170 point mechanical and cosmetic inspection and is backed by our 12 month ReCar Certified Guarantee FREE of charge! For added convenience and peace of mind, we offer a 7 day test drive which means within the first 7 days of ownership, if you are unhappy with the vehicle or feel you made the wrong selection, you may bring it back to ReCar and exchange it for a different vehicle in stock. This Certified vehicle comes with a Brand new NB MVI sticker on it, fresh oil and filter change and complimentary CarFax vehicle history report. Our Certified vehicles also get the Guaranteed Best Interest rates and we offer Customer focused Fixed, No Pressure Pricing. Our Non Commissioned vehicle advisors also offer test drives to your door on our Certified vehicles!
 
Fast, Flexible Financing for Everyone  We work with over 16 lenders; not only to get you the best possible rates but to also provide you with the best possible terms, regardless of your credit situation. No Obligation Pre-Approvals within 2 hours from the Comfort of Your Home!! Apply Online @ **********
 

 
It is the purchaser's responsibility to personally verify the year, make, model, mileage, options and any remaining or extended warranty prior to purchasing this vehicle. Although many of our ReCar Certified vehicles have multiple sets of keys, a minimum of 1 key can be guaranteed with our ReCar Certified vehicles. "}]

description: [{'description': 'Discover the 2023 Honda CR-V Sport, a versatile and stylish SUV now available at Bruce Honda in Yarmouth, NS. The CR-V Sport is designed to offer a perfect balance of performance, comfort, and advanced features, making it an excellent choice for families, commuters, and adventurers alike.The exterior of the 2023 CR-V Sport boasts a sleek and modern design, characterized by bold lines, a distinctive front grille, and sporty 19-inch alloy wheels. Its refined appearance is further enhanced by LED headlights, taillights, and fog lights, ensuring you make a statement wherever you go.Under the hood, the 2023 CR-V Sport is powered by a responsive 1.5-liter turbocharged 4-cylinder engine, delivering 190 horsepower and a smooth driving experience. Paired with a continuously variable transmission (CVT), this powertrain provides excellent fuel efficiency and responsive handling, making it ideal for both city driving and long road trips.Inside the spacious and well-designed cabin, the 2023 CR-V Sport offers a comfortable and practical environment with high-quality materials and advanced features. The interior includes supportive cloth seats, a 7-inch touchscreen infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility, and Bluetooth connectivity. Additional features such as a multi-angle rearview camera, keyless entry, and push-button start add to the convenience and enjoyment of every drive.Safety is a top priority in the 2023 CR-V Sport, which comes equipped with Honda Sensing technologies. This suite of advanced safety and driver-assist features includes adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, collision mitigation braking, and road departure mitigation, providing peace of mind for you and your passengers on every journey.Bruce Honda, located at 166 Starrs Rd in Yarmouth, NS, invites you to explore the 2023 Honda CR-V Sport. With a commitment to customer satisfaction and a reputation for excellence. '}]

description:
[{'description': "
The 2021 Honda CR-V Sport is a well-equipped trim level within the CR-V lineup, offering a balance of features, performance, and value. Here are some key features you can expect in the 2021 Honda CR-V Sport:
	
	
Engine: It is equipped with a 1.5-liter turbocharged 4-cylinder engine, which provides a good balance of power and fuel efficiency. This engine is known for its smooth performance and responsive acceleration.
	
	
	
Transmission: Continuously Variable Transmission (CVT), which is known across most Honda models for its efficiency and smooth operation.
	
	
	
Interior Comfort: The CR-V Sport includes cloth upholstery with sporty trim accents. It has heated front seats, a driver's seat with power adjustments, and ample cargo space thanks to the CR-V's versatile layout.
	
	
	
Infotainment: It comes with a touchscreen infotainment system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration, allowing seamless smartphone connectivity for navigation, music, and hands-free calls.
	
	
	
Exterior Styling: The CR-V Sport may feature 18-inch alloy wheels, fog lights, and sporty exterior accents such as a gloss-black grille and body-colored door handles and mirrors.
	
	
	
Optional Features: Depending on the market and specific configuration, optional features might include a premium audio system, a panoramic sunroof, and leather-trimmed seats.
	

Overall, the 2021 Honda CR-V Sport is designed for drivers seeking a blend of practicality, comfort, and modern technology in a compact SUV package. It's a popular choice among families and commuters alike due to its reliability, versatility, and extensive feature set
As a Steele Auto Certified vehicle, you have peace of mind that the vehicle has undergone a rigorous 85 point inspection and has been brought up to the highest of standards. Don't forget, at Steele Volkswagen we have financing options available for all credit situations! "}]

description: [{'description': "Experience the 2019 Honda CR-V LX, a versatile and dependable SUV now available at Bruce Honda in Yarmouth, NS. Known for its blend of practicality, comfort, and advanced features, the CR-V LX is an excellent choice for families, commuters, and adventurers alike.The exterior of the 2019 CR-V LX showcases a modern and sleek design, characterized by bold lines, a distinctive front grille, and stylish 17-inch alloy wheels. Its refined appearance is further enhanced by LED daytime running lights and a rear spoiler, adding both functionality and aesthetic appeal.Under the hood, the 2019 CR-V LX is powered by a 2.4-liter 4-cylinder engine, delivering 184 horsepower and a smooth driving experience. Paired with a continuously variable transmission (CVT), this powertrain offers excellent fuel economy and responsive handling, making it perfect for both city commutes and long road trips.Inside the spacious cabin, the 2019 CR-V LX offers a comfortable and well-appointed interior with high-quality materials and advanced features. The interior includes supportive cloth seats, a 5-inch color LCD screen, Bluetooth connectivity, and a rearview camera. The CR-V LX also provides ample cargo space with easy-folding rear seats to accommodate all your gear, whether you're heading to the grocery store or on a weekend getaway.Safety is a top priority in the 2019 CR-V LX, which comes equipped with a suite of advanced safety and driver-assist features. Standard features include the Honda Sensing technologies, which offer adaptive cruise control, lane-keeping assist, collision mitigation braking, and road departure mitigation. These features ensure peace of mind for you and your passengers on every journey.Bruce Honda, located at 166 Starrs Rd in Yarmouth, NS, invites you to explore the 2019 Honda CR-V LX. With a commitment to customer satisfaction and a reputation for excellence, Bruce Honda is your trusted destination for this reliable and stylish SUV. "}]

Adaptive Cruise Control

Econ Mode

Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Nova Scotia
 
Stock # 34452 

Warranty:
This vehicle's manufacturer warranty has expired."}]

description:
[{'description': "
The 2019 Honda CR-V EX-L is a mid-level trim of the popular Honda CR-V compact SUV, offering a blend of comfort, luxury features, and practicality. Here's a detailed overview of the 2019 CR-V EX-L:
Performance	
Engine: 1.5-liter turbocharged 4-cylinder engine.
	
Power: Approximately 190 horsepower and 179 lb-ft of torque.
	
Transmission: Continuously Variable Transmission (CVT).
	
Fuel Economy: Around 27 mpg city / 33 mpg highway.
Interior	
Seating: Five-passenger capacity.
	
Upholstery: Leather-trimmed seats.
	
Cargo Space: Approximately 39.2 cubic feet behind the rear seats and up to 75.8 cubic feet with the rear seats folded.
Technology	
Infotainment:			
7-inch touchscreen display.
		
Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration.
		
Optional navigation system (available through higher trims or packages).
		
	
Audio: 8-speaker sound system.
	
Bluetooth: Standard.
	
USB Ports: Multiple, including USB-A and USB-C.
Safety	
Honda Sensing Suite: Standard on the EX-L trim, includes:			
Collision Mitigation Braking System (CMBS).
		
Road Departure Mitigation System (RDM).
		
Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC).
		
Lane Keeping Assist System (LKAS).
		
	
Additional Safety Features:			
Rearview camera with dynamic guidelines.
		
Stability control and traction control.
		
Multiple airbags.
		
Comfort and Convenience	
Climate Control: Dual-zone automatic climate control.
	
Power Windows and Locks: Standard.
	
Keyless Entry: Standard with push-button start.
	
Sunroof: Standard.
	
Driver's Seat: Power-adjustable with lumbar support.
	
Steering Wheel: Leather-wrapped with controls for audio and cruise.
Additional Features	
Wheels: 18-inch alloy wheels.
	
Exterior: LED daytime running lights and automatic headlights.
	
Interior: Power-adjustable passenger seat, heated front seats, and a power liftgate.

The 2019 Honda CR-V EX-L stands out for its upscale features, spacious and comfortable interior, and advanced safety technologies. It provides a balance of practicality and luxury, making it a well-rounded choice for those seeking a compact SUV with a high level of comfort and convenience.
As a Steele Auto Certified vehicle, you have peace of mind that the vehicle has undergone a rigorous 85 point inspection and has been brought up to the highest of standards. Don't forget, at Steele Volkswagen we have financing options available for all credit situations! "}]

[{'description': "
 
Reduced! CRV LX AWD With Heated Seats, Apple CarPlay and Remote Start!
 
This 2020 Honda CRV LX offers a reliable and efficient driving experience with its 1.5L 4-cylinder engine and automatic transmission. Known for its smooth handling and impressive fuel efficiency, this CRV is perfect for both city commuting and longer road trips.
 
Inside, the CRV provides ample space and comfort, making it ideal for families or those who value a roomy interior. The cabin is thoughtfully designed with quality materials and features that enhance your driving experience, ensuring both driver and passengers travel in comfort.
 
Overall, this 2020 Honda CRV LX combines practicality, performance, and comfort into a well-rounded package. With its low mileage and reputation for reliability, its a great choice for anyone looking for a dependable and versatile vehicle.
 
Only $27,994 or $127/Wk Tax Inc $0 Down! Email ********** for more info!
 
All ReCar Certified Vehicles come with our 360 degree inspection which is a very meticulous and comprehensive 170 point mechanical and cosmetic inspection and is backed by our 12 month ReCar Certified Guarantee FREE of charge! For added convenience and peace of mind, we offer a 7 day test drive which means within the first 7 days of ownership, if you are unhappy with the vehicle or feel you made the wrong selection, you may bring it back to ReCar and exchange it for a different vehicle in stock. This Certified vehicle comes with a Brand new NB MVI sticker on it, fresh oil and filter change and complimentary CarFax vehicle history report. Our Certified vehicles also get the Guaranteed Best Interest rates and we offer Customer focused Fixed, No Pressure Pricing. Our Non Commissioned vehicle advisors also offer test drives to your door on our Certified vehicles!
 
Fast, Flexible Financing for Everyone  We work with over 16 lenders; not only to get you the best possible rates but to also provide you with the best possible terms, regardless of your credit situation. No Obligation Pre-Approvals within 2 hours from the Comfort of Your Home!! Apply Online @ **********
 

 
It is the purchaser's responsibility to personally verify the year, make, model, mileage, options and any remaining or extended warranty prior to purchasing this vehicle. Although many of our ReCar Certified vehicles have multiple sets of keys, a minimum of 1 key can be guaranteed with our ReCar Certified vehicles. "}]

description:
[{'description': "
 
EX-L AWD withApple CarPlay,Dual Zone Climate,Heated Seats and Wheel andRemote Start!
 
Discover the impressive performance of this 2020 Honda CR-V EX-L, featuring a 1.5L 4-cylinder engine and an automatic transmission. This CR-V delivers a blend of power and efficiency, providing a smooth and responsive driving experience. With its turbocharged engine, you'll enjoy spirited acceleration and confident handling on both city streets and highway drives.
 
Inside, the CR-V EX-L offers a luxurious and spacious cabin designed for maximum comfort. High-quality materials and meticulous attention to detail create a refined atmosphere, while the roomy interior ensures ample legroom for passengers. The addition of premium features and a user-friendly infotainment system enhances your driving experience, making every journey enjoyable.
 
This 2020 Honda CR-V EX-L combines stylish design with exceptional comfort and performance. Its striking red exterior and low mileage highlight its excellent condition, offering a well-rounded SUV ready to meet your driving needs and elevate your daily commute.
 
Only $32,998 or $150/Wk Tax Inc $0 Down! Email ********** for more info!
 
All ReCar Certified Vehicles come with our 360 degree inspection which is a very meticulous and comprehensive 170 point mechanical and cosmetic inspection and is backed by our 12 month ReCar Certified Guarantee FREE of charge! For added convenience and peace of mind, we offer a 7 day test drive which means within the first 7 days of ownership, if you are unhappy with the vehicle or feel you made the wrong selection, you may bring it back to ReCar and exchange it for a different vehicle in stock. This Certified vehicle comes with a Brand new NB MVI sticker on it, fresh oil and filter change and complimentary CarFax vehicle history report. Our Certified vehicles also get the Guaranteed Best Interest rates and we offer Customer focused Fixed, No Pressure Pricing. Our Non Commissioned vehicle advisors also offer test drives to your door on our Certified vehicles!
 
Fast, Flexible Financing for Everyone  We work with over 16 lenders; not only to get you the best possible rates but to also provide you with the best possible terms, regardless of your credit situation. No Obligation Pre-Approvals within 2 hours from the Comfort of Your Home!! Apply Online @ **********
 

 
It is the purchaser's responsibility to personally verify the year, make, model, mileage, options and any remaining or extended warranty prior to purchasing this vehicle. Although many of our ReCar Certified vehicles have multiple sets of keys, a minimum of 1 key can be guaranteed with our ReCar Certified vehicles. "}]

description:
[{'description': "NO ACCIDENTS / CLEAN CARFAX / 1 OWNER / Proximity Key w/ Push Button Start , Dual-Zone A/C, Heated Leather Wrapped Steering Wheel and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2021 Honda CR-V include:
 
Proximity Key w/ Push Button Start
Dual-Zone A/C
Heated Leather Wrapped Steering Wheel
Auto High Beam
ECON Mode Button
Honda Sensing Technologies
Power Tailgate
Apple CarPlay & Android Auto
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 32644 

Warranty:
This vehicle's manufacturer warranty has expired."}]

description: [{'description': "500+Used@ ********** * Phone ********** ------------------------------------------------------ Why buy a CenturyWholesale.ca used vehicle? ->WHOLESALE PRICING | Below Market-Value | SELLING TO YOU RATHER THAN THE AUCTION ->AS-TRADED | No MVI | No Warranty | No Exchange ->Professional EXTERIOR & INTERIOR DETAILING ->TRANSPARENT  CarFax Report ------------------------------------------------------ 150 Main St, Truro, Nova Scotia, B2N2V4 Our wholesale lot, located at 150 Main St., Truro, and managed through Century Hyundai at 138 Main St. We offer vehicles in their current condition without prior inspection or reconditioning. As such, we cannot guarantee their running order or the extent of any necessary repairs. These vehicles come from various dealerships, so their history is unknown. For your reference, the current Carfax report is available and provided at delivery. Please note that these vehicles are available for yard drives only, and third-party inspections are limited to the Truro area and must be confirmed. The inspection sticker has been removed, and the purchaser is responsible for obtaining a valid motor vehicle inspection and addressing any necessary pre-inspections or repairs. We provide a one-day transport permit, but delivery services are not available. Trade-ins and dealer inquiries are welcome. However, financing is not available for these vehicles. The ad will be removed once the vehicle is sold. Due to the high volume of inquiries, we are unable to respond to questions regarding availability or the specific repairs required for a motor vehicle inspection. Carfax Link... ********** Elevate your driving experience with the 2018 Honda CR-V Touring, now available at a special wholesale price! This top-tier SUV blends style, comfort, and cutting-edge technology, making every journey a pleasure. Stay connected with ease thanks to the CR-V's advanced tech features, including Apple CarPlay and Android Auto smartphone integration. Enjoy the convenience of an electric parking brake and the peace of mind provided by a multi-angle backup camera, making parking a breeze. Safety is a priority in the CR-V Touring. Honda Sensing, the full suite of active safety features, comes standard in this model. Experience forward collision warning with automatic braking, lane departure warning with steering assist, radar cruise control, and road departure mitigation, all designed to keep you and your passengers safe on the road. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a 2018 Honda CR-V Touring at a fantastic wholesale price, or add it to your used car inventory! "}]

description:
[{'description': 'NO ACCIDENTS / CLEAN CARFAX / 1 OWNER / Heated Front Seats, Blind Spot Information System  , Auto High Beam  and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2023 Honda CR-V include:
 
Heated Front Seats
Blind Spot Information System
Auto High Beam
Collision Mitigation Braking System
Hill Start Assist
Driver Attention Monitor
Traffic jam Assist
Forward Collision Warning
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 33567 

Warranty:
This vehicle has only 13 months or 29,000km of warranty left.'}]

description:
[{'description': "Awards:
  * JD Power Canada Automotive Performance, Execution and Layout (APEAL) Study   * ALG Canada Residual Value Awards Silver 2017 Honda CR-V LX AWD CVT 1.5L I4 Turbocharged DOHC 16V LEV3-ULEV70 190hp Atlantic Canada's largest Subaru dealer.

All Wheel Drive, AWD, Apple CarPlay/Android Auto, Auto High-beam Headlights, Automatic temperature control, Exterior Parking Camera Rear, Forward collision: Collision Mitigation Braking System (CMBS) + FCW mitigation, Front dual zone A/C, Fully automatic headlights, Heated front seats, Lane departure: Lane Keeping Assist System (LKAS) active, Steering wheel mounted audio controls, Telescoping steering wheel, Tilt steering wheel.


WE MAKE IT EASY!

Reviews:
  * Owners tend to comment positively on ride quality, overall comfort, versatility, flexibility, roominess, and good fuel efficiency. The CR-V, when equipped with proper winter tires, is a confident and sure-footed performer in winter months, and several upscale design touches throughout the handy and accommodating cabin were also highly rated. Source: autoTRADER.ca "}]

description:
[{'description': "Based on the reputation of treating customers from all over the country with great customer service we believe that Top Notch is a great place to buy a used vehicle. We believe that the first purchase here at Top Notch will not be your last. The business was built on referrals and repeat business over many successful years. Fully inspected vehicle that passes a certification level MVI (Motor Vehicle Inspection) vehicles that pass the Nova Scotia standards for safety As-traded vehicles  vehicles for the do it  yourselfer Vehicles from $999 and up, a range for every buyer Vehicles on consignment  sell it yourself for a fee In-house financing/ a large range of banks and finance companies - for small loans or big, for great credit, credit that needs to be established, or for those that have had some bad luck in the past and need to be re-established Full range of protection packages and warranties for every vehicle sold We can give you one-on-one advice with one of our trained financial service managers Home deliveries/or pick-up We offer a locate service, meaning we will bring in a vehicle for you from out of town, out of province just for you. Car-proof upon request Full range of trade-in vehicles from new car dealers, vehicles bought off the street and vehicles bought at auction. We'll buy your vehicle whether or not you buy one from us 

Warranty:
 3 month/ 5,000km complimentary power train warranty!"}]

description:
[{'description': "NO ACCIDENTS / CLEAN CARFAX / Auto on/off Headlights, HomeLink Remote System, Heated Front Seats and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2019 Honda CR-V include:
 
Auto on/off Headlights
HomeLink Remote System
Heated Front Seats
HandsFreeLink Bluetooth System
Power Windows
Remote Start
Walk Away Door Locks
Apple Carplay & Android Auto
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 

Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 34322 

Warranty:
This vehicle's manufacturer warranty has expired."}]
